TextView.android:text:
NOTE: To run Prboom, you need to load a Doom WAD file. However, to run any Doom WAD file with Prboom, you'll also need a special WAD file in that folder called prboom.wad

Go to this repository: https://github.com/libretro/libretro-prboom

Copy the prboom.wad file to your device and put it in the same directory as the Doom WAD you're trying to play.
